title: Brian Stelter on Fox News and Reed Hastings on Netflix
description: Stelter talks about "Hoax: Donald Trump, Fox News and the Dangerous Distortion of Truth" and Reed Hastings discusses "No Rules Rules: Netflix and the Culture of Reinvention."
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
